title: Draft funding norms out for offshore wind energy
description: The government has issued draft norms for viability gap funding of 1,000 MW offshore wind energy projects in Gujarat and Tamil Nadu with an outlay of â‚¹6,853 crore. Projects will be awarded through international competitive bidding by the ministry of new and renewable energy via the Solar Energy Corporation of India.
